ygData.subject: Re: Bathory!
ygData.msgSnippet: I submitted the beginning info on that quest. When i delivered Trumpy Irontoe s to Grimrot i was only level 10. At that time i didnt have a clue as to what the
ygData.messageBody:
I submitted the beginning info on that quest.
When i delivered Trumpy Irontoe's to Grimrot i was
only level 10. At that time i didnt have a clue as to
what the quest was for.
When i asked grimrot about Arlena (which was the the
keyword he gave me when i turned the skull) he told me
about Arlena who he created, but she took off while he
was away. He suspected that she headed back to her
home which was Mistmoore. He askes that you track her
down and bring back her bones.

Now, some how, some way someone thought to bring back
a lute from a named gypsy (not Arlena) to grimrot.
I have no idea where they got that info from.

I have talked to Grimrot a few times after that, and
he has always me for her remains.

I know people who have extensivly traveled Mistmoore,
and no Arlena is to be found.
There are various gypsies, vampyres and so forth. But
no one named Arlena.

Either she never existed, or Verant hid her under
another name.

Someone else,forgot name, found out the lute part.
Again, i have no idea where that came from.

I have yet to actually venture into Mistmoore myself.
Getting stuck on that wretched continent with those
putrid High Elves and dirtmongering Dwarves is not my
idea of a good time.

I also want to see what my faction is before i go in
there. I made the mistake in Najena by just going in
there and killing stuff, when my faction was Dubious
with all but the undead. I think i may try to get in
there and talk with NPCs before i start trying to kill
them. Never know what i may uncover :)


Well, i had more to write, its time to go home and
actually play :)


Bye

Bathory D'Allatu

--- Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...> wrote:
> From: Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...>
>
> a weird question just popped into my head :)
>
> it was YOU who found the EBW thru the grimrot quest,
> right bathory?
>
> well.. have you tried doing the grimrot quest since
> somebody said that the
> EBW was obtained via the the avenging caitiff in MM
> (which makes it damn
> near impossible for us to get one now ;p)? who
> knows.. there may be TWO ways
> to get this weapon.. :)
>
> Beld Demonblade
> Fennin Ro
>
